title: Looking for N162 Keefe or N28 Ward, or N284 O'rourke
author: zljones

posts.post_title: Looking for N162 Keefe or N28 Ward, or N284 O'rourke
posts.post_content:
I cannot afford all of these cards at once but I am looking for the following:

N162 Tim Keefe Auth-fair
N28 John Ward  Auth-fair 
N284 O'rourke (hands on thighs) Auth-good
N29 Buck Ewing Auth-poor

and maybe a N162 King Kelly Auth-fair as long as price is lower, or else I can't afford right now

I only want to pay fair market value not crazy extra inflated prices.  If you have more than one of these, and are patient, maybe I can buy one at a time off you.  At this point I want the N162 Keefe the most.
